entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
